title: uchegod-21
author: uchegod-21
content: My people, I carry this matter come here make we for understand one or two things. E get wetin I discover for this our pidgin wey we dey carry hold bodi for this local board. E get how you go take write this pidgin e go come hard to understand pass normal English. Make we avoid am abeg. I discover say some of us, when we wan type for pidgin, we go use plenty of abbreviations wey no make sense, all in the name of pidgin. Abeg, abbreviation no be pidgin, infact e dey create more problems for reading pidgin. Make we learn how to type in full for pidgin make our write ups for make sense. I for mention names, but I believe those people when dey read this post go adjust. Na everyday we dey learn. If you check this my post, na pidgin I knack but you no go see abbreviations full everywhere.For conclusion, wetin I mean be say, pidgin no mean say you go use abbreviation full everywhere but if that same person wan type for English, you no go see any unnecessary abbreviations.

I hail you.On a serious note sha, make we try adjust as the OP don point am out so that we go fit caryy everybody along.Una doh

comments.body: Quote from: Wiwo on September 27, 2023, 06:25:37 PMBaba the truth be say,  Sokani comment na one of those kind comment were dey use Abbreviation as you point out,  and for sure we need amend amm so that people were dey put eye read our comment go easily understand and we fit dey flow together for we corner for here. But make we no too blame us because pidgin gets as e be and no be everybody fit the write with pidgin dey use full words without abbreviations sake of say the way I'm own pidgin be different from others but as we come here now we need to change that kind way of writing sake of say no be only we dey come here others dey come and we from different places. I think we dey get somethings wrong about pidgin english and abbreviations. As dem no teach us pidgin for school e dey hard for us to get di right spellings of some certain words. So there are no true spellings, while writing in pidgin we use English words and sometimes we try to make our words different by using words like: odas(others), dis(this), Pipu~piple(people), sae(say), neva(never), dem(them), di~de(the), den(then), kontri(country), tori(Story) etc. I wouldn't call the aforementioned words abbreviations if am writing in pidgin, they can be called abbreviations or wrong words when I'm using them in formal writings. Abbreviations in pidgin and English language that I'm aware of are words like 4(for), 2(to), yr(year), ur(your), d(the), con3(country) abbr(Abbreviation) etc.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: Pidgin na our own local English Language and I no think say this suppose be problem to us wey come from Naija because we fit understand am easily, even with abbreviation. Na just say the visitors wey dey always come our board na them go find am confusing. The problem wey I see with abbreviation be say your own way of write up go differ from the other person base on different environment wey we grow up. Another thing be say he make people wey dey read no fit flow easily with wetin you dey explain. But if na the part of say make anybody wey visit our board understand wetin we dey yarn, I no think say he mean anything because some local boards for this forum, if you no from that country, you no go fit understand wetin them dey discuss. For the sake of easy flow and good contributions make we no abbreviate words, I find am difficult to abbreviate words and I no know why.
